meaningMnemonic: What do you <radical>eat</radical> if you’re wearing <radical>horns</radical> and surrounded by <radical>lantern</radical>s? <kanji>Mochi</kanji> (or <kanji>sticky rice cake</kanji>s) of course!
readingMnemonic: The reading of <kanji>mochi</kanji> is <reading>mochi</reading> (もち). Yay!
